backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, posts with images and tags, access control, feed retrieval, and basic messaging storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-report JSON mapping implemented features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind styles defining global OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, auth gating, profile setup flow, and global incoming-call handling.
frontend/src/components/calling/Incoming: Displays an alert dialog for incoming voice/video calls with accept and decline actions.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Search: Search input form with clear button for submitting text-based post searches.
frontend/src/components/discovery/TagChi: Fetches and displays selectable tag badges for filtering posts by tag.
Layout shell with navigation, auth handling, and footer; conditionally shows links based on login state and manages login/logout actions.
frontend/src/components/messages/Convers: Scrollable list of conversations showing user avatars, last messages, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/messages/Message: Displays a chat thread with polling, message sending, and auto-scrolling for a selected user.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a single post preview with image, caption, author info, and timestamp linking to the post page.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCompos: Form for creating a new post with image upload, caption, tags, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Editor form for updating a user's display name, bio, and avatar with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial profile creation dialog prompting for display name and bio on first login.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallSignaling.ts: Zustand store managing incoming and active call state with polling placeholder logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider wrapping Dfinity AuthClient to load, manage, and expose Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Custom hook that runs a callback on a setInterval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for profiles, posts, tags, and messages with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRTCCall.ts: Manages local media, mute/camera toggles, and connection state for a simple WebRTC call.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CallPage.tsx: Call UI page connecting WebRTC state with user profile and call controls.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Page wrapping the PostComposer component and navigating back on success.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Feed display with search, tags, and post results gated by Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Renders the messaging layout with a conversation list and message thread, currently using an empty placeholder conversation list.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with image, author info, tags, and call/message actions, fetching the post from the feed by ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user's profile with avatar, bio, posts, and messaging/calling options, including an edit dialog for the owner.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing with sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and image asset needs for the inspiration-sharing app.
